# Sagebrush Studio

> Sagebrush Studio is a web design and development studio based in Jackson, Wyoming, founded by Hannah Trask. We help locals, creatives, and community-driven businesses establish a strong online presence through custom websites, migrations, and technical consulting.

## About

Hannah Trask is a freelance web developer and web designer with 5+ years of experience, specializing in creating websites that are beautiful, intuitive, and effective for small businesses. Sagebrush Studio serves clients in Jackson Hole, Teton Valley, and throughout Wyoming.

## Services

- **Web Design & Development**: Custom websites on Squarespace, Wix, Shopify, WordPress, and custom HTML/CSS/JavaScript
- **Website Migrations**: Moving sites between platforms while preserving SEO and content
- **Technical Consulting**: Helping businesses make informed decisions about their web presence
- **Internal Applications**: Custom tools and applications for business operations

## Location

- Based in Jackson, Wyoming (Jackson Hole)
- Serving clients in Teton Valley, Wyoming, and remotely

## Contact

- Website: https://wearesagebrush.com
- Email: hannah@wearesagebrush.com
- Contact Form: https://wearesagebrush.com/contact
